ModMetaData.name: ED-CheatReactor
ModMetaData.author: Jaxxa
ModMetaData.description:
Version: 0.17.0 Discussion, Non Steam Downloads and GitHub Repositories of this mod is available at: https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=18995
Adds a Reactor that produces a lot of Power, is Built Instantly and for Free. It goes without saying that this is in no way balanced and should only be used for testing or cheating.
I know that there is a debug power option in the menu, but I find this more helpful for testing.
